effect_entries.effect: Teaches Payback to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Payback to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ためこんで　攻撃する。
相手より　後に　攻撃できると
技の　威力は　２倍に　なる。

The user stores power, then attacks.
If the user moves after the target,
this attack’s power will be doubled.

Chi la usa accumula forza, poi attacca.
La potenza raddoppia se agisce dopo il Pokémon
nemico.

Oprime al enemigo de cuatro a cinco turnos,
durante los cuales no podrá huir.

Der Anwender lädt die Attacke auf. Handelt das
Ziel vor dem Anwender, verdoppelt sich die Kraft
der Attacke.

Le lanceur charge son énergie, puis attaque.
La puissance est doublée si le lanceur agit
après l’ennemi.

힘을 모아 공격한다.
상대보다 나중에 쓰면
기술의 위력은 2배가 된다.

ちからを　ためこみ　こうげきする。
あいてより　あとに　だせると
わざの　いりょくは　２ばいに　なる。

The user stores power, then attacks.
If the user can use this attack after
the target, its power is doubled.

The user stores power, then attacks.
If the user can use this attack after
the target, its power is doubled.

Le lanceur charge son énergie, puis
attaque. La puissance est doublée
si le lanceur agit après l’ennemi.

The user stores power, then attacks.
If the user can use this attack after
the foe, its power is doubled.

The user stores power, then attacks.
If the user can use this attack after
the foe, its power is doubled.

If the user can use this attack after
the foe, its power is doubled.
